trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow that executes activities sequentially.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un flusso di lavoro che esegue in sequenza le attività.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> with `Initialized` and `Completed` events for optional processing of parameters.
trans-unit.target: L'oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> è fondamentalmente un oggetto <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> con eventi `Initialized` e `Completed` per l'elaborazione facoltativa di parametri.

trans-unit.source: This makes it particularly useful as a top-level activity when you design sequential-style workflows.
trans-unit.target: Questo la rende particolarmente utile come un'attività di livello superiore quando si progettano flussi di lavoro in stile sequenziale.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: L'attività <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> è un'attività <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, vale a dire che l'attività <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> può contenere altre attività.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Nome dell'attività definito dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> mediante il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow has finished.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica al termine del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> class, and set the event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come creare una nuova classe <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> e come impostare il gestore eventi per l'evento <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Policy SDK Sample from the DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Questo esempio di codice è parte dell'esempio SDK Policy nel file DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs file.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Advanced Policy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Avanzate criteri](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> che fa riferimento all'evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> in which dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> in cui è possibile eseguire aggiornamenti dinamici nel flusso di lavoro, quando viene eseguito l'override in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: Una <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> che identifica quando possono essere eseguiti gli aggiornamenti dinamici.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Runs the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> at the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> at the end of the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> di <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> al termine dell'operazione richiesta.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il flusso di lavoro viene inizializzato.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta la classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> che fa riferimento all'evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associato all'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Genera l'evento <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> per <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="executionContext" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="executionContext" /> è un riferimento null (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
